page.title: 08Interview with a mother
page.content: Do you like living in Whitburn? Yes. Why do you like it? I have always lived here so I don't know what it is like to live anywhere else. Would you rather live somewhere else? No I would rather stay here.I wouldn't like to live in a town where it is noisy.There are too many busy roads. How long have you lived in Whitburn? I was born here so I have lived here thirty-seven years. Has there been any changes since you came here? Yes. What changes have been made? There is a lot more houses.There is a lot more people.The schools have changed because when I went to school it was all where the Comprehensive is now and that was the Infants,Juniors
